text: Josephus Lyles (born 22 July 1998) is an American sprinter. He attended T. C. Williams High School in Alexandria, Virginia. In July 2016, Josephus and his older brother Noah turned professional and signed with Adidas. He holds the American Junior record in the 4x400 meters relay at 3:00.33, along with teammates Zachary Shinnick, Brian Herron and Sean Hooper set at the 2017 Pan American U20 Athletics Championships. His parents Keisha Caine and Kevin Lyles competed in Track and Field at Seton Hall University. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Track and field athletes from Florida Category:Sportspeople from Gainesville, Florida Category:American male sprinters Category:African-American male track and field athletes
title: Josephus Lyles
